oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Miss Pettingill Proposes - 1940-02-20
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Miss Pettingill Proposes. Announcer David Cobb and Miss Pettingill host a "radio column of the air", answering listener letters with advice, and featuring musical interludes. The label appears to be dated 1940-02-20 (Tuesday), however it is announced that the day is a Monday and the "2" on the label is somewhat questionable - the only month of 1940 where the 20th fell on a Monday is May, meaning a possible date of 1940-05-20 (unconfirmed).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (Miss Pettingill, David Cobb) -- Miss Pettingill talks -- [Unidentified music] -- David Cobb and Miss Pettingill read letters -- [Unidentified music] -- David Cobb and Miss Pettingill read letters -- [Unidentified music] -- Closing statement (David Cobb, Miss Pettingill) -- Theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Miss Pettingill proposes (Radio program); Cobb, David (Announcer)
